titleStmt.title: Branch of the People's Bank of Kentucky, Hartford

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Branch of the People's Bank of Kentucky, Hartford

body.p: Bank in Hartford, Kentucky. Branch of the People's Bank of Kentucky, established in 1856 and headquartered at Bowling Green, Kentucky. President: Larkin Nall, Cashier: John C. Morton.

ab.bibl: KYR-0001-017-0041; "An Act to establish the People's Bank," February 15, 1856, in Richard H. Stanton, ed., The Revised Statutes of Kentucky, Vol. II (Cincinnati: Robert Clarke & Co, 1867), 478-87.
